Reviews.Title: efficient

Reviews.Content: Big camera (maybe to big)Pictures are nice, detailled.Link to syno surveillance application: Detection automatique.Night view could be better (remove the protection for better view)

Reviews.Title: Vivotek FD8161

Reviews.Content: Again i was really satisfied with the product that i received because it was authentic camera and i bought it much cheaper than it can be found at the electronic stores.Thank you a lot.

Reviews.Content: great camera nice image qualityat a affordable price, 2 megapixel gives you  great surveillance where ever you need it
